articles.title: Update to iOS 14.5 will add new Scribble support and improved subscription sheet - PhoneArena
articles.description: When the stable version of iOS 14.5 is released this spring, it will include additional language support for Apple's finger-based Scribble text input system; it also will feature an updated ...

articles.author: Cosmin Vasile
articles.title: YouTube app can now play 4K HDR videos on Android devices - PhoneArena
articles.description: Starting this week, YouTube added the same 4K resolution option to Android devices that don't actually support it.
articles.content: YouTube, our gateway to an entire multimedia world, is getting more and more features as technology advances. Sometimes, one of Google's most important apps is getting a bit behind with times when it… [+1361 chars]
